articles.description: Leveraged loans make up an approximately $1.6 trill ion market, and a variety of financial experts have raised concerns about the booming industry. These loans are typically packaged into complex credit instruments which are then purchased by pension funds an…
articles.content:
Leveraged loans have caught a lot of heat in recent months. 
 These loans are, in simple terms, to riskier companies which have amassed a large amount of debt relative to their earnings. And the market for these loans has boomed. 
 Amid an extended period o… [+4998 chars]
